flawed_nl_solution:
The first cut will result in 100 / 2 = <<100/2=50>>50 square inches of fabric.
The second cut will result in 50 / 2 = <<50/2=52>>52 square inches of fabric.
Fatima will have donated a total of 50 + 52 = <<50+52=102>>102 square inches of fabric.
#### 102

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
